name: 5ire
description: 5ire - Sustainable Distributed Computing 5ire is a fifth-generation blockchain with a mission to bring a shift from for-profit to a for-benefit economy. 5irechain's main goal is to create a user-centric sustainability-driven ecosystem. This is achieved by embedding sustainability in the consensus mechanism architecture. 5ire uses Machine Learning to track +700 ESG data sources in real-time to form a Sustainability Score for the Validators of the chain. 5ireChain's transparent on-chain governance mechanism allows everyone to participate in the network democratically, and propose changes which assures a jus tified fair representation of all the stakeholders.
